<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 280 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Favored Weapon** [Breath Of The Endless Sky](/Deities.aspx?ID=366), [Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=513), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=590), [Elion](/Deities.aspx?ID=405), [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [General Susumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=306), [Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=689), [Isph-Aun-Vuln](/Deities.aspx?ID=583), [Jukha](/Deities.aspx?ID=556), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=462), [Phlegyas](/Deities.aspx?ID=546), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=495), [Sky Keepers](/Deities.aspx?ID=232), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Ylimancha](/Deities.aspx?ID=488)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 6 gp

**Damage** 1d8 P

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1+

**Range** 100 ft.

**Reload** 0
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Type** Ranged

**Category** Martial

**Group** [Bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

**Ammunition** [Arrows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=443)

</column>

---

This 5-foot-tall bow, usually made of a single piece of elm, hickory, or yew, has a powerful draw and is excellent at propelling arrows with great force and at an extreme distance. You must use two hands to fire a longbow, and it can't be used while mounted.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-3" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Hunter's Anthem](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2867), [Splithead Bow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3209)
